_validation_notes: At least one of ticker/isin/issuer_id must be provided (validated at Pydantic level).
description: Input schema for risk-analytics-mcp.issuer_peers_compare tool. Compares an issuer against peers using key fundamental and market metrics.

as_of_date.description: Date for data snapshot in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to today.

index_ticker.description: Index used to pick peers (e.g. 'IMOEX', 'RTSI'). Ignored if peer_tickers is provided.

isin.description: ISIN identifier (used if ticker is not provided).

issuer_id.description: MOEX issuer id (optional, used if ticker/ISIN not available).

max_peers.description: Maximum number of peers to include in the report.

peer_tickers.description: Explicit list of peer tickers (overrides index-based lookup).

sector.description: Optional sector filter to narrow peer selection (e.g. 'FINANCIALS').

title: IssuerPeersCompareInput
